channel.title: hugo on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Building Website with Hugo
item.description: Hugo Commands # create a site hugo new site nareshchaurasia cd nareshchaurasia # launch visual studio code code . # checkout theme cd themes git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/giraffeacademy/ga-hugo-theme # create content hugo new a.md hugo new dir1/b.md YouTube Playlist Hugo Tutorial Tutorial 1 01:03 Hugo Make use of GO Programming 04:48 Simple Comparison static V/s dynamic website. Tutorial 4 02:51 archetype: what is common to entire website.
